overview:
Rael Dornfest is a user experience engineer for Twitter.

Previously, he was Founder and CEO of Portland, Oregon-based Values of n. Rael leads the Values of n charge with passion, unearthly creativity, and a repertoire of puns and jokes â€” some of which are actually good. Prior to founding Values of n, he was O’Reilly’s Chief Technical Officer, program chair for the O’Reilly Emerging Technology Conference (which he continues to chair), series editor of the bestselling Hacks book series, and instigator of O’Reilly’s Rough Cuts early access program. He built Meerkat, the first web-based feed aggregator, was champion and co-author of the RSS 1.0 specification, and has written and contributed to six O’Reilly books. Rael’s programmatic pride and joy is the nimble, open source blogging application Blosxom, the principles of which you’ll find in the Values of n philosophy and embodied in Stikkit: Little yellow notes that think.
